Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Flabbergast \Flab"ber*gast\ (fl[a^]b"b[~e]r*g[a^]st), v. t. [Cf. {Flap}, and {Aghast}.] To astonish; to strike with wonder, esp. by extraordinary statements. [Jocular] --Beaconsfield. [1913 Webster]
flabbergast v : overcome with amazement; "This boggles the mind!" [syn: {boggle}, {bowl over}]
